text:
Hi there, fellow HubSpot trainee here! I noticed this too and then I stumbled upon a small line in the documentation that says that a HubSpot Module acts like a dnd_column. so what you would like to have is a different structure.

The following structure should do the trick:

```section
 -row
 --module
 --module
 -end_row
end-secton```
Also this page helped me understand it a lot better: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas>
and this is the paragraph I was referring to where it state that modules act like columns: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas#columns>
Hmm Try putting the columns inside a {% dnd_row %} --- {% end_dnd_row %} and see if that works.
Never mind - I see you found it.:-)
